successes.title: bloom blanket
successes.description: A cozy piece of art, inspired by origami, for anyone to have at home.

Pledges.description:
Thank you!
Send me a message if you would like your name to be added to the list of backers on bloom's website.

A postcard from Barcelona. . . I'll design a card with bloom's geometric aesthetic in mind and mail it to you. Send me a message if you would also like your name to be added to the list of backers on bloom's website.
A bloom blanket. . . In your choice of colour: white or grey. Send me a message if you would also like your name to be added to the list of backers on bloom's website.
A bloom blanket. . . In your choice of colour: white or grey. Send me a message if you would also like your name to be added to the list of backers on bloom's website.
A customised hand-painted design of the bloom blanket with your choice of size and arrangement of tetrahedrons as well as of colours. . . I'll contact you so that we can plan it together.
